adjectives.description: aggrieved (comparative more aggrieved, superlative most aggrieved)

entries.meaning: Angry or resentful due to unjust treatment.
examples: I am aggrieved at the conditions which have been forced upon me.

entries.meaning: (law) Having one's rights denied or curtailed.
examples: The aggrieved person may present their petition to the court for review.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of aggrieve
